about_the_game:
Hello everyone, we are happy to announce the Love & Sex: Second Base Supporter pack.
It is a bundle of bonus goodies for the fans who want to go take things further in supporting us developers.

More stuff will be added to the supporter pack as time goes by.
The Love & Sex Supporter Pack includes the following digital items:
- Exclusive Deathless Harpies song
- Lexi wallpaper
- Sasha wallpaper
- Minami wallpaper
- Samantha wallpaper
- Bree wallpaper

This list will expand little by little so stay tuned for more goodies!
Thanks everybody from the bottom of our hearts for your wonderful support.
Andrealphus Games
